Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.

And Ã¾er-fore go we now forth with hym in hast. ius judeus it xal be don and Ã¾at in short spas. ijus judeus ?a but loke yf he be bownd ryth wel and fast. iijus judeus he is saff A-now go we ryth A good pas. here Ã¾ei ledyn jhesu A-bowt Ã¾e place tyl Ã¾ei come to Ã¾e halle. Annas ffrom Ã¾is cetye in to Ã¾e lond of Galyle he hath browth oure lawys neyr in-to confusyon with hese craftys wrowth be nygramancye shewyth to Ã¾e pepyl be fals symulacyon. ius doctor ?a ?et ser A-nother and werst of Alle A?ens sesare oure emperour Ã¾at is so fre kyng of jewys he doth hym calle So oure emperourys power nowth xulde be. ijus doctor Sere pylat we kan not telle half Ã¾e blame Ã¾at jhesus in oure countre hath wrowth Ã¾erfore we charge Ã¾e in Ã¾e emperorys name Ã¾at he to Ã¾e deth in hast be browth. Jhesus Of here A-cusyng me rowth nowth so Ã¾at Ã¾ei hurt not here soulys ne non mo I haue nowth ?et founde Ã¾at I haue sowth ffor my faderys wyl fforth must I go. Pylat Jhesus be Ã¾is Ã¾an I trowe Ã¾ou art A kyng and Ã¾e sone of god Ã¾ou art Also lord of erth and of All Ã¾ing telle me Ã¾e trowth if it be so. Jhesus In hefne is knowyn my faderys intent And in Ã¾is werlde I was born be my fadyr I was hedyr sent for to seke Ã¾at was for-lorn. Alle Ã¾at me heryn And in me belevyn And kepyn here feyth stedfastly Ã¾ow Ã¾ei weryn dede I xal Ã¾em recuryn and xal Ã¾em bryng to blysse endlesly. Pilate Lo serys now ?e An erde Ã¾is man how thynk ?e thynke ?e not All be ?oure reson but as he seyth it may wel be and Ã¾at xulde be be Ã¾is incheson. I fynde in hym non obecyon of errour nor treson ne of no maner gylt The lawe wele in no conclusyon With-owte defawth he xuld be spylt. ius doctor Sere pylat Ã¾e law restyth in Ã¾e and we knowe veryly his gret trespas to Ã¾e emperour Ã¾is mater told xal be yf Ã¾ou lete jhesus Ã¾us from Ã¾e pas. Pylat Serys Ã¾an telle me o thyng What xal be his A-cusyng. Annas Sere we telle Ã¾e al to-gedyr Ffor his evyl werkys we browth hym hedyr And yf he had not An evyl doere be we xuld not Abrowth hym to Ã¾e. Pylat Takyth hym Ã¾an Aftyr ?our sawe and demyth hym Aftyr ?our lawe. Cayphas it is not lefful to vs ?e seyn no maner man for to slen. Ã¾e cawse why we bryng hym to Ã¾e Ã¾at he xuld not oure kyng be. weyl Ã¾ou knowyst kyng we haue non but oure emperour Alon. Pylat Jhesu Ã¾ou Art kyng of jure. Jhesus So Ã¾ou seyst now to me. Pylat Tel me Ã¾an where is Ã¾i kyngham. Jhesus my kyngham is not in Ã¾is werld I telle Ã¾e At o word. yf my kyngham here had be I xuld not A be delyveryd to Ã¾e Pylat Serys A-vyse ?ow as ?e kan I can fynde no defawth in Ã¾is man. Annas Sere here is a gret record take hed Ã¾er to and knowyng gret myschef in Ã¾is man And not only in o day or to it is many ?erys syn he began We kan telle Ã¾e tyme where and whan Ã¾at many A thowsand turnyd hath he As All Ã¾is pepyll record weyl kan from hens in-to Ã¾e lond of galyle et clamabunt ?a. ?a. ?a. Pilat Serys of o thyng than gyf me relacyon if jhesus were out born in Ã¾e lond of galelye ffor we han no poer ne no jurediccyon of no man of Ã¾at contre Ther-fore Ã¾e trewth ?e telle me And A-nother wey I xal provyde if jhesus were born in Ã¾at countre Ã¾e jugement of herowdys he must A-byde. Cayphas Sere as I am to Ã¾e lawe trewly sworn to telle Ã¾e trewth I have no fer in galelye I know Ã¾at he was born I can telle in what place and where A?ens Ã¾is no man may Answere for he was born in bedlem jude and Ã¾is ?e knowe now All and haue don here Ã¾at it stant in Ã¾e lond of galelye.
